name: Worm Go Down (LD48)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 48 (theme - Deeper and Deeper).

You are the worm. You go down. Use WASD to move, the mouse to aim, and left/right mouse buttons to shoot. Collect powerups and make your way down to the depths to defeat the Big Dude!

If you can, please rate the game at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/worm-go-down
